    • StudentExamController

      public StudentExamController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the exam interface with the provided URL and resource bundle.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - the location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - the resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized. This method performs the following tasks: - Initializes the answers array based on the exam size. - Populates the question list view with questions. - Sets the exam name label. - Adds a listener to the question list view to display the selected question. - Displays the number of questions. - Sets up the exam time limit and starts the countdown timer. - Displays the initial question. - Prevents the exam tab from being closed.

    • updateLabel

      public void updateLabel()
      Function updateLabel() to update the time label. This is to correctly show the time remaining in the format of hh:mm:ss

    • stopExam

      public void stopExam()
      Function stopExam() to stop exam when time is up. Alert the user that the time is up, then submit the answers for questions that have been completed, then close the exam UI.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String title, String text, Runnable onHidden)
      Function showAlert(title, text, onHidden) to show alert to user.
      Parameters:
      title - is the title of the alert
      text - is the main message of the alert
      onHidden - is the function to run when alert is closed. If null, then simply show alert.

    • nextQuestion

      public void nextQuestion()
      Function nextQuestion() to handle displaying the next question in the question list.

    • LoadQuestion

      public void LoadQuestion(int questionNumber)
      Function LoadQuestion(questionNumber) to load a specific question at index questionNumber
      Parameters:
      questionNumber - is an index in the questionList. It represents the location of the question to be displayed.

    • SaveAnswer

      public void SaveAnswer(int questionNumber)
      Function SaveAnswer(questionNumber) adds the answer of the student into an internal array
      Parameters:
      questionNumber - is the index of the current question

    • submit

      public void submit(boolean timeUp)
      Function submit(timeUp) is a function to submit the answer array. It gives alerts to the user if they really want to submit the exam, and it also sends the user back to the exam if there are questions left unanswered.
      Parameters:
      timeUp - checks if the submit function is passed due to time limit reached. If true, then the function will skip the checks and submit the answer immediately.

    • handleSubmit

      public void handleSubmit()
      Function handleSubmit() is a function to be called when the submit button is pressed. The function calls submit(timeUp) function.

    • checkAnswers

      public void checkAnswers(String[] studentAnswer)
      Function checkAnswers(studentAnswer) compares the student's answer array with the answers stored in the database.
      Parameters:
      studentAnswer - is the array of the student's answers for the exam that is to be marked.

    • closeExamUI

      public void closeExamUI()
      Function closeExamUI() to close the exam interface.

    • cannotCloseStage

      public void cannotCloseStage()
      Function cannotCloseStage() to prevent the student from exiting the exam interface by clicking 'X'. This prevents the student from leaving the exam without submission.
